resources.string: Please answer the following questions as best you can, then submit for your score!
You can display text in your Android app using which View object?
A LinearLayout can display Views using which of the following?
Your application resources can be accessed in Java using the ______ class.
This class is used for your application to launch a new service or app functionality
It is a good idea to store your app Strings in this file to keep content separated and help with localization efforts:
That\'s it! Go ahead and click the grading button below to get your score. Good luck!
